headline: Why Micron Stock Is Plummeting Today
summary: Micron Technology (NASDAQ: MU) stock is getting hit with big sell-offs Thursday.  At the same point in the day's trading, the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite were down 5.4% and 6.2%, respectively.  Micron skyrocketed yesterday after President Donald Trump announced a 90-day pause on his administration's reciprocal tariff policy for almost all countries.

headline: Time to Buy the Dip on Micron Stock?
summary: Shares of memory chip manufacturer Micron Technology (NASDAQ: MU) have been hit hard over the past month, and the announcement of tariffs last week by the Trump administration added fuel to the fire.  Micron stock has dropped more than 35% from its one-month high, and it's down nearly 60% from its 52-week high.  Or is Micron stock poised to drop further as economic uncertainty ramps up?
